faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Travel Agency Website Creation
faq.subtitle: All answers to the questions you're asking yourself

questions.question: How much does creating a travel agency website cost?
questions.answer: The price varies according to your specific needs (number of destinations, booking features, integrations...). Our packages start from €2,500 for a showcase site up to €8,000 for a complete platform with advanced booking system. Contact us for a free personalized quote.

questions.question: Is the online booking system secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We integrate PCI-DSS certified payment solutions (Stripe, PayPal) with 256-bit SSL encryption. All client data is protected according to European GDPR standards. Your clients can book with complete confidence.

questions.question: Can I manage my site content myself?
questions.answer: Yes, your site will be equipped with an intuitive CMS allowing you to easily modify destinations, prices, photos and content. We train you on its use and remain available for any questions.

questions.question: Will the site be well indexed on Google?
questions.answer: We optimize your site for SEO from creation: technical structure, travel keywords, optimized content, loading speed... You'll also benefit from advice to improve your local positioning in Boulogne-Billancourt.

questions.question: How long does it take to create the site?
questions.answer: Development generally takes 3 to 4 weeks depending on complexity. We follow a precise schedule: 1 week for design, 2 weeks for development, then testing and training. You can track progress in real time.

questions.question: Do you offer maintenance and updates?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance contracts including: automatic backups, security updates, technical support, and minor modifications. This guarantees the security and optimal performance of your site.

questions.question: Will the site work on mobile and tablet?
questions.answer: All our sites are responsive design, meaning they automatically adapt to all screens (smartphone, tablet, computer). User experience is optimized for each device, essential when 70% of travel searches are done on mobile.

questions.question: Can I integrate my social accounts and newsletter?
questions.answer: Of course! We integrate your social networks (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) and configure a newsletter system to build client loyalty. You'll be able to share your most beautiful destinations and maintain the connection with your travelers.
